name: Bissell® SpinWave Hard Floor Expert Corded Spin Mop Cleaner with Washable mop Pads for Sealed Hard Floors, 20393
short_description: EFFORTLESS CLEANING POWER: Powerful corded spin mop with reusable, long-lasting mop pads that do the scrubbing for you. VERSATILE FLOOR PROTECTION: Safe on sealed hard floors and powers through tough, sticky messes on wood, tile, linoleum, and more.​ TARGETED STAIN REMOVAL: On-demand spray feature lets you dispense BISSELL formula with the push of a button for effective, focused cleaning.​ EASY TO MANEUVER: Lightweight design and swivel steering make it easy to reach spaces around furniture and baseboards.​ CONVENIENT AND ACCESSIBLE: Includes 6 reusable mop pads and 3 trial-size cleaning solutions, allowing you to complete 6 full cleaning sessions with the provided trial-size formulas.
product_description: No more getting down on your hands and knees to scrub the floor! BISSELL SpinWave Hard Floor Expert uses powered spinning mop pads to safely clean sealed hard floors, so it does the work for you. It's safe and effective on tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and more. The on-demand spray control allows you to put as much, or as little, solution on the floor as you need. SpinWave Hard Floor Expert's lightweight design and swivel steering make cleaning along baseboards and under furniture and cabinets easy. And while you’re cleaning, don’t worry about disrupting others around you. SpinWave Hard Floor Expert was engineered to make minimal noise while in use, giving you a powerful clean without the powerful noise. The machine also comes with a removable, Easy-Fill Clean Water Tank that has a filling guide for cleaning both small and large areas. Plus, it comes with 2 scrubby mop pads for tough, sticky messes, 4 soft-touch mop pads for everyday cleaning, a trial-size bottle of Hard Floor Sanitize Formula, and 2 trial-size bottles of Wood Floor Formulas that leave behind a fresh scent. This product also helps save pets! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

name: BLACK+DECKER Steam Mop, White (HSM13E1)
short_description: NO HARSH CHEMICALS NEEDED – Steam-Mop HEATS UP QUICKLY – Ready for use in 30 seconds. USE ON SEALED SURFACES – Versatile cleaning of sealed hardwood flooring, tile, stone, grout, laminate, and granite. SWIVEL HEAD – Mop head pivots for easy maneuverability around and underneath furniture and in cramped areas. MICROFIBER PAD – Glides smoothly and easily across surfaces. 12 FT. CORD – Corded design offers unlimited runtime for even the biggest jobs. INCLUDES – (1) HSM13E1 classic Steam-Mop, (1) SMP20 microfiber pad, (1) jack plug.

name: Hoover Steam Complete Steam Mop, Hard Floor Cleaner Machine, Multipurpose Cleaner Machine, Includes Carpet Glide Attachment, Ideal for Hardwood, Vinyl, Tile, Grout and More
short_description: MULTIPURPOSE STEAM CLEANER MACHINE: Powerfully clean using the natural power of steam with the Hoover Steam Complete Steam Mop. No harsh chemicals required. TARGETED CLEANING POWER: This steam hard floor cleaner features SteamStream Technology, allowing you to spray hot steam directly onto any mess for optimized steam cleaning power. ALL-TERRAIN CAPABILITY: This steam cleaner works on all sealed hard floor types, including hardwood, tile, laminate, linoleum, ceramic, porcelain, and stone. It also transforms into a handheld steamer for versatile home cleaning. GO BEYOND HARD FLOORS: Coming complete with the carpet glider attachment, this Hoover steam mop helps you tackle messes on carpets and area rugs. NOBODY DOES IT LIKE YOU: For more than 100 years, Hoover has designed powerful, reliable, easy-to-use products that clean your entire home from floor to ceiling. It’s why we’re one of the most trusted brands in America.
product_description: Harnessing the power of steam for comprehensive cleaning, the Hoover Steam Complete Steam Mop delivers a deep, thorough clean across all kinds of floors. Featuring SteamStream™ technology for targeted steam cleaning, all-terrain capability ensuring access to every surface in the house, and a carpet glider attachment for carpets and area rugs, this floor cleaner guarantees optimal performance with every use. Its lightweight, portable design and easy-pull trigger provide effortless cleaning, making it the ideal choice for fast, convenient floor care. For more than 100 years, Hoover has designed powerful, easy-to-use products that clean your entire home from floor to ceiling. Since 1908, consumers and businesses have trusted Hoover to provide reliable, innovative cleaning solutions. Today, we offer a comprehensive line of products for general and special-purpose vacuuming, including full-size uprights and canisters, deep cleaners, and hard floor cleaners.

name: OVENTE Electric Steam Mop Cleaner, 1300W Floor Steamer with Swivel Head, Refillable Water Tank and Washable Microfiber Pad for Cleaning Carpet, Hardwood, Laminate Floor, Tiles and Grout, White ST405W
short_description: POWERFUL STEAM FLOOR CLEANER – With 1300W of power, this steam mop is tough on stains yet gentle on floors. It uses the natural power of heated steam to deeply clean your home. Unlike traditional steamers, this mop delivers up to 2x better stain removal, making it ideal for tackling stubborn, stuck-on messes. INNOVATIVE DESIGN & FUNCTION – The triangle-shaped swivel head provides easy access to hard-to-reach areas while maximizing surface coverage. It releases steam continuously for up to 15 minutes, ensuring efficient floor sanitization. Simply refill the water tank when needed to keep cleaning without interruption. EASY TO USE – Designed with a comfortable handle and a light-touch power button. It features a convenient cord wrap to secure the 13-foot cord, preventing tripping hazards and allowing for easy transportation and quick storage. For efficient operation, simply lay the mop flat, open the water tank, and use the provided cup to fill it with water. COMPLETE PACKAGE – This steam mop includes a 350ml water tank, a refill measuring cup, a carpet glider, and one microfiber pad (replacement pads available for purchase). The microfiber cleaning pad easily attaches to the steam mop’s head. Simply detach it after use and wash it by hand or toss it in your washing machine. US-BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE LETS YOU BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – OVENTE warranties that the product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship under normal use and conditions, for 1 year from the original purchase date.
product_description: Gone are the days of lugging a mop and bucket around your home! With the OVENTE Steam Mop ST405W, you can easily and effectively clean your floors with one simple device. It produces 15 minutes of continuous steam release, the steam mop will sanitize your home’s floors without the need for harsh chemical cleaners. The triangle-shaped swivel head is designed to make maneuvering around your home easy so you can effortlessly clean your hardwood, marble, tile and stone floors. Simply attach the carpet glider to thoroughly clean your carpets as well. The included high-density microfiber cleaning pads can be easily attached to and detach from the mop head via Velcro strips. Caring for your cleaning pads is easy, just put it into the washer and dry it off. Carry your steam mop safely from room to room with the built-in cord storage wrap, which also makes storing your steam mop nice and neat. If you run out of water before cleaning is done, simply add more water to the tank with the help of the refill measuring cup and continue with your cleaning. Unlike many steamers for cleaning, the OVENTE Steam Mop is perfect for homes with children and pets.

name: Schenley 7-in-1 Steam Mop Dual-Rod Design with Detachable Handheld Steamer for Walls, Grouts, Hard Floors, Tiles, includes Multi-purpose Accessories and Washable Microfiber Pads
short_description: [Fast Heating for Immediate Use] Get started quickly with the Schenley Hestia Steam Mop's rapid heating feature, reaching temperatures of up to 248°F in just 15 seconds. With three on-demand steam modes, you have full control to address tough, sticky messes or for a quick, easy clean. [Chemical-Free and Safe for Families] Harness the power of water-only cleaning to protect your family and pets. The Schenley Steam Mop's dual-rod design eliminates the need for harsh chemicals, effectively removing sticky messes and keeping your living spaces safe and spotless. [Detachable All-in-1 Steamer] Equipped with 7-in-1 accessories and washable microfiber pads, the detachable handheld steamer effectively tackles sticky messes, grease, and stubborn stains on various surfaces including kitchen stoves, bathroom sinks, hard floors, tiles, windows, and more, making it an essential component for comprehensive home cleaning. [Time and Effort-Saving Design] With its extended power cord, this steam mop delivers up to 25 minutes of continuous cleaning, allowing you to clean a regular-sized kitchen without refills. Cover more ground efficiently and save time and effort in your cleaning routine. [Lightweight and Easy Maneuver] The lightweight design, combined with a 180-degree swivel, makes it easy to navigate around furniture and into tight spaces. Enjoy a thorough clean with minimal effort, ensuring every corner of your home is spotless.

name: Tineco Floor ONE S5 Smart Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors, Digital Display, Long Run Time, Great for Sticky Messes and Pet Hair, Space-Saving Design, Blue
short_description: SMART VACUUM & MOP TWO-IN-ONE – Clean wet or dry messes and tackle tough and sticky messes on hard floors with ease. Featuring Tineco’s proprietary iLoop Smart Sensor Technology, it automatically adjusts suction, water flow, and brush roller speed to clean any and all messes. CUTTING-EDGE CLEANING PERFORMANCE – The exclusive FLOOR ONE S5 brush roller is designed to glide closely against baseboards and clean hard-to-reach corners. Your floors become completely dry and streak-free in minutes. A MAJOR UPGRADE – The clean water tank is 30% larger than the last gen FLOOR ONE, allowing you to clean larger areas without interruption. The dual-tank system keeps clean and dirty water separate, so you’re always cleaning with fresh water and solution. EASY MAINTENANCE – Never touch a dirty roller again. The hands-free, self-cleaning function automatically flushes the inner tubing and brush roller, for fast, mess-free maintenance. The pet hair strainer makes pet hair removal quick and easy for homes with pets. The 3-in-1 docking station stores and charges the unit for utmost convenience. One Press Self-cleaning—The Floor ONE S5 self-cleaning cycle deep-cleans the brush roller and tubing for hands-free maintenance. After cleaning, centrifugal drying effectively removes water from the roller.

name: Bissell PowerFresh Vac & Steam All-in-One Vacuum and Steam Mop, 2747A
short_description: Vacuum and steam your hard floors at the same time Sanitize floors using the natural power of steam, eliminating 99. 9% of germs and bacteria Easy Touch Digital Controls to switch between vacuum, steam or both Powerful, cyclonic vacuum helps capture dirt and debris Includes: 1 microfiber soft pad, 1 microfiber scrubby pad and a detachable mop pad tray
product_description: Skip your multi-step cleaning routine and clean your floors in one easy step. The Bissell Power Fresh Vac and Steam All-in-One Vacuum and Steam Mop vacuums up dirt and debris while steam cleaning your hard floors at the same time. Sanitize floors with the natural power of steam to eliminate 99. 9% of germs and bacteria. The Easy Touch Digital Controls allow you to seamlessly switch between functions while cleaning, so you can vacuum and steam at the same time or separately. It is safe to use on sealed hard floors including hardwood, tile, ceramic, linoleum, marble, and granite. Using microfiber pad, use as directed. Results may vary.

name: Shark S7201 Steam & Scrub with Steam Blaster Technology All-in-One Hard Floor Steam Mop with 3 Steam Modes & LED Headlights, Black
short_description: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE: Powerful steam and rotating pads provide up to 3x better stuck-on stain removal vs. traditional steam mops**. STEAM BLASTER: A powerful and targeted steam blast that is controlled at touch of finger to provide even more steam power for stubborn stains and spots. EASE OF USE: Rotating pads deliver over 150 scrubs per minute, providing an effortless glide and a smooth cleaning experience—the pads do all the work. FINGERTIP UI: Easily control steam modes and activate Steam Blaster through the handle 3 STEAM MODES: Light, for quick cleanups; Normal, for everyday use; and Deep, for stuck-on messes and stains. CHEMICAL-FREE SANITIZATION: Removes 99.9% of bacteria without chemicals to ensure your floors are safe for pets/kids. LED HEADLIGHTS: Powerful LED headlights reveal hidden debris around your home
product_description: The Shark Steam & Scrub with Steam Blaster Technology scrubbing and sanitizing* steam mop gently scrubs and sanitizes* all at once. The combination of steam and rotating pads delivers up to 3x better stuck-on stain removal vs. traditional steam mops** while providing chemical-free sanitization*.

name: Shark Steam Mop Hard Floor Cleaner for Cleaning and Sanitizing with XL Removable Water Tank and 18-Foot Power Cord (S1000A),White
short_description: Water tank capacity 12.68 fluid ounce. The power of steam Made easy Effortlessly clean and sanitize with just water sanitization studies were conducted under controlled test conditions. Household conditions and results may vary. See owner's guide for details Removes grease and grime no chemicals and no residue Easily fill and refill XL removable water tank. On demand steam ready within 30 seconds Lightweight and compact. Easy to use and store
product_description: Shark Steam Mop Hard Floor Cleaner for Cleaning and Sanitizing with XL Removable Water Tank and 18 Foot Power Cord (S1000A)

name: Swiffer PowerMop Multi-Surface Mop Kit for Floor Cleaning, Includes PowerMop, 2 Mopping Pad Refills, 1 Cleaning Solution with Fresh Scent and 2 Batteries
short_description: 1. COMPLETE KIT: This Swiffer PowerMop kit includes a spray mop, 2 Swiffer Power Mop refills, 1 floor cleaner for mopping with a fresh scent, and 2 batteries for a comprehensive floor cleaning solution 2. SUPERIOR CLEANING POWER: Experience 5X cleaning power with hundreds of scrubbing strips that absorb and lock to fight your toughest messes and get them off your floors. *pad layers vs. Swiffer WetJet pads 3. SMART AND FAST CLEANING: Mop smarter with Swiffer PowerMop and clean your home in half the time vs. a mop and bucket *includes cleaning and drying time 4. FRESH SCENT: Reinvigorate your home and enjoy the fresh scent for hours. Leaves behind up to 2 hours of freshness after initial product use 5. SAFE FOR USE ACROSS ALL HARD SEALED SURFACES: The Swiffer PowerMop is safe for use across all hard sealed and finished surfaces - do not use on unfinished, oiled, or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles, or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive
product_description: Mop smarter with the Swiffer PowerMop, an all-in-one mopping system that gives you a mop and bucket clean in half the time*. The multi-surface mopping pads have 300+ scrubbing strips that reach deep into grooves and grout to remove sticky spills and daily dirt and grime. The fresh scent of PowerMop solution will fill your home with freshness for hours**. Some assembly required; batteries included. *vs. mop and bucket – includes cleaning and drying time **Leaves behind up to 2 hours of freshness after initial product use
